name: attribute
description: A link between a service and one or more classifications that describe the nature of the service provided.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier of the attribute entry. Each attribute entry should have a unique identifier.

link_id.name: link_id
link_id.title: Link Identifier
link_id.description: The identifier of the entity to which this taxonomy term applies.

taxonomy_term_id.name: taxonomy_term_id
taxonomy_term_id.title: Taxonomy Term Identifier
taxonomy_term_id.description: The identifier of this taxonomy term from the taxonomy table.

link_type.name: link_type
link_type.title: Link Type
link_type.description: A code taken from an enumerated open codelist to indicate what the taxonomy term describes, e.g. the service eligibility or intended audience.

link_entity.name: link_entity
link_entity.title: Link Entity
link_entity.description: The table of the Link Identifier.

value.name: value
value.title: Value
value.description: The value (if any) of an attribute.

taxonomy_term.name: taxonomy_term
taxonomy_term.title: Taxonomy Term
taxonomy_term.description: Each service can be categorized according to one or more taxonomy terms. The taxonomy_term object contains a list of taxonomy terms, their names, and, for hierarchical taxonomies, their structure.

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: A record of the changes that have been made to the data in order to maintain provenance information.

label.name: label
label.title: Label
label.description: A free text label of the attribute.
